author: forthommel
body: Added the capability to set the input tag for the PileupSummaryInfo collection retrieval. This new method can be used for the interaction with MiniAOD files (using slimmedAddPileupInfo instead of addPileupInfo as a label for the vector<PileupSummaryInfo> collection)
title: Set the input tag for the PileupSummaryInfo collection retrieval
